steps.title: Start the local target server
lines: glyphctl demo ▸ Launching static target on http://127.0.0.1:7777
glyphctl demo ▸ Using bundled fixtures so the demo works offline

steps.title: Crawl the page with Excavator
lines: excavator ▸ Discovered 4 internal links and 2 external links
excavator ▸ Wrote crawl transcript to out/demo/excavator.json

steps.title: Rank and triage findings
lines: ranker ▸ Loaded 7 findings and produced deterministic scores
ranker ▸ Saved ranked output to out/demo/ranked.jsonl

steps.title: Render the interactive report
lines: scribe ▸ Generated HTML report with evidence thumbnails

summary: ✔ Demo complete! Sample artifacts stored under out/demo/
⭐ Case preview highlights the login thumbnail and copy-ready POC

artifacts.label: Open sample HTML report
artifacts.description: Review the reference report the demo builds locally.

artifacts.label: View findings.jsonl
artifacts.description: Inspect the structured findings that Seer emits.
